```js
myChart.getModel().getSeriesByIndex(0).getData().getItemVisual(dataIndex, 'color')
```
HI @rgomesf , can you post a shot of the example you request.

可以参考 https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/loading/default.js 实现自己的 loading 效果，使用 echarts.registerLoading 方法注册，参考 https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/echarts.js#L2330

> 这个问题麻烦@Ovilia看一下吧

多谢 麻烦帮我确认一下 是我应用的问题 还是应用时确实存在这样的问题，我在查阅资料时看到有挺多人遇到了这样的问题
请问解决了这个问题吗？
是的，dataset模式确实有这个问题。并且其中的dataIndex也不是正确的数组下标，只能自己维护一个数组下标来提取到正确的数据了。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19374680/48252112-c9d3b400-e43e-11e8-962e-d63fe9019373.png)

👍  同样遇到该问题， 手动引入jquery之后解决，对新手稍微有点不友好 :) 。

Guys, could you please write in English?

I've recently started watching in project, and I believe that it has no chance of graduating from the Apache Incubator if people need use a translation service for everything.

Thank you!

Hi @pissang . Sure. Here you go 

![capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/914653/48261296-836a5f00-e416-11e8-8c12-8056f177a9f7.PNG)

Be able to format the lines as arrow would also be a nice feature.

@SchnWalter 

Yeah, you know this project was developed by chinese company named baidu, so I use chinese, but i was glad to translate for you.

This issue is about echarts' official website.

In the demo on url http://echarts.baidu.com/examples/editor.html?c=graph-webkit-dep

click the DOWNLOAD button will download a sample file with bug which lack the import of jquery.

> 可以参考 https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/loading/default.js 实现自己的 loading 效果，使用 echarts.registerLoading 方法注册，参考 https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/echarts.js#L2330

你好，针对这个方法实验后端效果  似乎并不理想,效果没有被覆盖
```js
echarts.registerTheme('customed',...conf);
echarts.registerLoading('customed', {
        text: '请稍后...',
        color: 'blue',
        textColor: '#fff',
        maskColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)',
        zlevel: 0
      })
```
结果还是原来多

Yes, I know and I'm thankful for that. But now that the library is part of the Apache Incubator, which is great, it would be nice to gradually transition to English where it may be relevant or helpful for other people. It's nice to be able to search the web for an issue and find a discussion around it. Most people will search in English.

P.S. Thanks for all your work!

你可以下载最新版本4.2.0-rc.2
http://www.echartsjs.com/download.html

@zhuchangfeng You can filter negative data when processing data.
Because negative values in pie charts are meaningless. Do you have negative special needs?

Hey! Thanks for your response. I think you misunderstood, though.

What I am wondering is if you have the ability to add functionality such that I can **specify the path of the saved file relative to my file system.** I imagine I cannot do this on react, since it is client side, though..
Browser settings control the download folder.

@jbadilla I see.   
'image://http://xxx.xxx.xxx/a/b.png'
This way seems to be possible, but there are cross domain issues.
Can't you turn the local file into Base64 to handle it?
Not work after angular7

All is good, guys! I've decided to just convert the base 64 to a blob, and then send it in the request to the server so that it is handled in the back-end. I just wanted to know if there was compatibility like other tools (i.e. browserify-fs).
@SchnWalter Thanks for your advice. I'll figure something out about this problem and find a way to encourage more people to use English in issues.
4里怎么实现同时隐藏纵坐标？
获得路径node和link，重新加样式，重新生成图表。。。
果然可以，谢谢
@zhuzhiyuan 不用客气
确认了，折线图不支持这样的动画效果，暂时没有计划支持。

@Vvvickie Thanks for your contribution! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
Now you are one of the ECharts contributors. Since we joined Apache group, you need to assign ICLA for your first PR.
Please fill in the PDF and print it, then sign on it and send the scanned file to secretary@apache.org and oviliazhang@gmail.com.
This may be a little tricky, and sorry for the trouble. This is required for the first time your commit is merged in. If you refused, your commit will be backed off.

And are you interested in being an ECharts committer? This has more restrict rules than contributors. Committers are those who contribute more frequently and play more important roles on ECharts project.

After being a committer:

You can have write access to the ECharts code
You can mange issues (add tags, assign to someone, ...)
You can discuss about features with us committers more frequently with Email
You name and personal page link will be displayed at ECharts Website About page
See this for more information
If you are interested, here's what you can do:

Subscribe our mailing list by send an email to dev-subscribe@echarts.apache.org
When you want to discuss with us about something, send email to dev@echarts.apache.org
Help others by replying issues regularly
Make more useful pull requests (fix bugs or make enhancement in issues)
Here are some issues that may be easier to be fixed: https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/projects/3

And you will be invited to be a committer when we think your contribution and knowledge of ECharts project is enough. We are looking forward to this! 😃
Loading styles may differ greatly for varied requirements. So I guess this has to be done by DOM, or do you have other suggestions on how we could provide this style setting in a more general way?
http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-boxplot.boxWidth 可以设置百分比
Duplicate of #8888

I didn't reproduce when I add `progressiveThreshold: 1000000000` to the effectScatter in  [http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xhmDTgZ5P_](http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xhmDTgZ5P_) .
Could you please provide a full example at http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html or jsfiddle?
Could you please provide a full example at http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html ?
Can you provide an image to show what you need?

By using the same name with different series, user can toggle legend display at the same time.
We are considering adding an all-in-one legend toggling method to switch on and off all the legends. But currently you should use the same series name to do so.
How was the transform implemented? By CSS transform rotate?

I tried with option without series provided by @arashdalir , but the `rendered` and `finished` event is triggered.
As about the mouse event on other components, we are considering to support this. See: https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/issues/9281
Currently this is not supported and we have no easy way to implement this. Marked as new-feature.
`dimension` should be 2 instead of 1. The data `[73, "Good", "Good"]` is in the form of `[xAxis value, yAxis value, data value]`, so we should use data value with visualMap.

Axis cannot know which series is using its axis index. So there's no way we can do this automatically.
However, you can [listen to the legend changes](http://echarts.baidu.com/api.html#events.legendselectchanged), and use `setOption` to change the yAxis.
We are working on switching legend all on and all off.
@huimei123 Can you provide a working example on http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html ?

@mathiasleroy Please make a pull request to us and @pissang  will have a further look.
Thanks for your contribution!
Seems to be a bug that axisLabel doesn't show when not giving min and max.
目前没有更好的解决方案。
Use `'time'` type and format label use http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#xAxis.axisLabel.formatter

> By using the same name with different series, user can toggle legend display at the same time.
> We are considering adding an all-in-one legend toggling method to switch on and off all the legends. But currently you should use the same series name to do so.

Yes, but when I use the same series name, I can not control the series independently. All I want is to control some of series all-in-one but also control series independently.

Finished :）It seems you forget to attach the pdf. Anyway I find it somewhere else. 
With pleasure to join you^.^

@Ovilia  as said, the functions work, but in the wrong order. interesting enough, this has no effect on the chart's options (i.e. `var options = chart.getOptions` delivers the right options). so technically, it's not an issue on itself, but rather a chronological problem with the events...

这个问题在多个source的情况下也会出现， @pissang 关闭动画后仍然会有这个问题，具体的出现的场景是：两个source存在数据数量上的差异就会复现（比如source A有15条数据，source B有17条数据，source B就不会再按序排列了）

下图两条线对应两个source且都是按序排列的

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7855327/48387332-609abc00-e730-11e8-9e61-b1198e0f35f1.png)

我也遇到类似的情况，设置 xAxis.min = "dataMin"  和 xAxis.max = max:"dataMax"  后
`series: {
          label: {
            show: true,
            fontSize: 22,
            color: '#000',
          },
          boundaryGap:["20%","20%"],
          barMaxWidth:50,
          type: 'bar',
        },`

@Ovilia 目前，在 chrome 下面，可以采取监听 echart 绑定的父亲 dom 元素的 mousedown/mouseup 事件，来实现一些跟这个 issue 相关的需求。但 ie/edge 下面，mousedown/mouseup 事件没有冒泡上去，被吃掉了，导致无能为力。希望可以解决这个 issue 的同时，关注下 ie/edge 下面的事件冒泡问题～

Here are some tips that you may try with:

- Use SVG instead of Canvas
- Dispose charts in not active tabs and init it when active
- Only call setOption for active tabs rather than when request call backs
You may use [splitArea](http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#yAxis.splitArea) to set background color with 3 colors. But axis labels and ticks don't support different settings.
Sorry this feature is not quite related to ECharts and I'm afraid we cannot support it.
Currently, no. But this is a good idea and can be served as an improvement.
